name: Trafalgar Law
text:
[Blocker]
[On Play] You may return 2 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order: Choose one of the following,
◉Draw 1 card.
◉If your opponent has 5 or more cards in their hand, they discard 1 card from their hand.
